title: Microsoft.Windows.10.Enterprise.Final.x64.ISO-SCC
description:
SCC proudly presents the following NONE-SCENE * EXCLUSiVE *
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Application.: Windows 10 Enterprise FINAL (Build 10240) x64 (c) Microsoft
Type........: OS
Date........: 2015-July-21
Protection..: KMS
Crack.......: KMS-Activator
Language(s).: EN-US
Size........: 76 x 50 MB
Web.........: https://www.microsoft.com

INSTALL NOTES
~~~~~~~~~~~~~

1) Extract
2) Burn
3) Boot from DVD and install
4) Run the Microsoft Toolkit.exe as Administrator in crack dir
5) Activate Windows according to the screenshots provided in crack dir
6) Enjoy!

RELEASE NOTES
~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The component "AutoKMS" is obviously ! NO ! virus as some AV-apps may suggest.
Why should be obvious, make sure to add the folder C:WindowsAutoKMS to your
AV-app exclusion list, or the re-activation will not work in the future anymore!

This release is to be considered RTM in various news-articles and as infos suggest,
the exact same version re-sellers received to ship out to customers at the end of july 2015,
except of the inconvenient fact that those releases will not be possible to activate
offline like the one we just provided :-)

Differences between the editions of Windows can be reviewed in the included .pdf in crack dir!
Alternative: Try Bing

Note: This release is NOT meant to upgrade your current Windows! We strongly suggest to
do a CLEAN install (format c:) with this iso, so consider yourself warned!
